import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion'; import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive'; import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; import DropdownButton from 'react-bootstrap/DropdownButton'; import productListJson from "../../data/productList.json"; const ProductNavbar = () => { const isMobile = useMediaQuery({ query: `(max-width: 760px)` }); const params = useParams(); const activeTab = params.productid; /*Function is for single accordion with no sub-categories*/ let navigate = useNavigate(); function routeChange(pathName){ if(pathName === "dermatological") { let path = `/products/dermatological`; navigate(path); } else if(pathName === "disinfectants") { let path = `/products/disinfectants`; navigate(path); } else if(pathName === "medical-tools") { let path = `/products/medical-tools`; navigate(path); } } const productDDL = productListJson && productListJson.map( category => { return(
{category.name} {category.products.map( product => (
{product.displayText}
))}
); }) return ( <> {productDDL} {/* Supplements Brain boosters / Memory enhancers Heart health Joint health Liver tonic Natural anti-oxidants Hormones / Oral contraceptives Slimming / Weight management Injury Blunt trauma Muscle relaxants Wound healing Illness Cough & cold preparations Ear, nose & throat preparations Urinary incontinence Others Dermatological Disinfectants Medical tools */} {/*First line of code has been commended out to control default collapse for accordion*/} {/* */} Supplements
  • Brain boosters / Memory enhancers
  • Heart health
  • Joint health
  • Liver tonic
  • Natural anti-oxidants
  • Hormones / Oral contraceptives
  • Slimming / Weight management
Injury
  • Blunt trauma
  • Muscle relaxants
  • Wound healing
 Illness
  • Cough & cold preparations
  • Ear, nose & throat preparations
  • Urinary incontinence
 routeChange("dermatological")}> Dermatological routeChange("disinfectants")}> Disinfectants routeChange("medical-tools")}> Medical Tools {/* */} ); } export default ProductNavbar;
